title: Henriques Pinto (Luis de Miranda)
body: He was appointed the general governor of this archipelago on November 18, 1635, and took office on June 6, 1636, ending his term on June 6, 1640. He was the last general governor of Madeira, with his successor being referred to as governor and captain-general.

1635: Appointment of Luis de Miranda Henriques Pinto as general governor of Madeira
1636: Assumption of office by Luis de Miranda Henriques Pinto as general governor of Madeira
1640: End of the term of Luis de Miranda Henriques Pinto as general governor of Madeira
